Date format: ISO (year-month-day)
Current blog categories: all (select from categories), games, author-update, brain-leak

TODO when new blog post is created:
1. Record date of creation and category ing blog-entry
2. write title in blog-meta>h1
3. add content to blog-content div


            <!-- Begin blog entry -->
            <!-- EDIT data-date and data-category -->
            <div class="blog-entry" data-date="" data-category="">
                <div class="blog-meta container">
                    <h1></h1>
                    <!-- DO NOT EDIT blog-meta-info-->
                    <div class="sub-container blog-meta-info"></div>
                </div>
                <!-- EDIT blog-content  -->
                <div class="blog-content invisible">

                </div>
            </div>
            <!-- End blog entry -->
